attributes.action: Prioritise Frontline Nursery Workers for the COVID-19 Vaccination
attributes.additional_details: Additionally, frontline nursery workers have been put at great risk and unlike schools who were told to close, they were provided with testing kits prior to closing.  Early years staff have been completely disregarded, even though the Government are saying the risks are lower amongst preschool children, this is proven not to be the case. Act now or there will be no staff to care for key workers children and will result in nursery closures!
attributes.background: Support frontline nursery workers to receive the COVID-19 Vaccination as they have been completely forgotten about and are providing care to ALL children, including children of key workers.
